subject: College Athletics
Basketball
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Kevin Jones and Devin Ebanks each had 16 points and No. 8 West Virginia held off a strong second-half rally to defeat Seton Hall.
snippet: Kevin Jones and Devin Ebanks each had 16 points and No. 8 West Virginia held off a strong second-half rally to defeat Seton Hall.
